en.title: When did you first find out about the adultery?
en.whenAdulteryFound: If you're not sure, use the closest date you remember.

errors.requireFirstFoundDate: Enter a date between the day you got married and the day you submitted your divorce application.

adulteryFirstFoundDate.question: Enter the Adultery found date
adulteryFirstFoundDate.allRequired: Enter a date between the day you got married and the day you submitted your divorce application.
adulteryFirstFoundDate.dayRequired: Enter the day when Adultery first found
adulteryFirstFoundDate.monthRequired: Enter the month when Adultery first found
adulteryFirstFoundDate.yearRequired: Enter the year when Adultery first found
